name: jangle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a noise like metal hitting metal: He jangled his keys in his pocket. The wind-chimes jangled gently in the tree above us.

Idiom
jangle someone's nerves
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a noise like metal hitting metal: [ I ] The phone jangled insistently.
